Key Match Events: Ryan Noda hit a ninth-inning single to break up the no-hitter, allowing the Athletics to score two runs in the ninth
Pre-Game Insights: The Athletics' manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance, particularly from young relievers like Easton Lucas and Devin Sweet
Post-Match Reflections: Seth Brown reflected on the team's efforts to avoid being no-hit, saying 'You're doing everything you can do to avoid it'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Athletics' young relievers, including Easton Lucas and Devin Sweet, showed promise in their performances against the Astros
Others: Easton Lucas made his Major League debut on Friday and struck out Yordan Alvarez in his outing
Devin Sweet recorded his first career win in his A's debut on Friday
